definition[0]: a large amount of money that you can win in a game that is decided by chance
definition[1]: a large prize you can win in a LOTTERY (=a game of chance in which people buy tickets with numbers on)
example[2]: this week’s £3 million jackpot in the National Lottery
example[3]: General Dynamics sees a potential jackpot in these new aircraft.
definition[3]: if a person or organization hits the jackpot, they make a lot of money, or have a big success
example[4]: Du Pont chemists have hit the jackpot with this new fiber.
